lead_paragraph: Alabama safety Rashad Johnson was charged with disorderly conduct for knocking a security guard down at an off-campus bar, the Tuscaloosa police said. The 22-year-old Johnson, a first-team all-Southeastern Conference pick, was arrested after a brief struggle, the police said.
